game.name: Tears of Vanfell
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Your life begins anew in front of an imposing mountain... Climb and explore it with a wide cast of characters in this dungeon crawler RPG with up to four player Co-op.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your life begins anew in front of an imposing mountain... Climb and explore it with a wide cast of characters in this dungeon crawler RPG with up to four player Co-op.
